The Tomb of Pope Alexander VI

label: Description
value: The tomb of Pope Alexander VI (1942-1503) set in a niche with Renaissance ornamentation. Below, three medals, and at the top, two others, in allusion to the Pope's collection (possibly an illustration for a book on the Pope's numismatic collection).
